stories_not_found_title: Sori! Ol stori blg tanim i no stap.
stories_not_found_body: Sori! Ol stori blg tanim i no stap! Ating folda yu bin makim i no holim stori blg tanim. Makim gen raitpela ' "SP Templates' folda we ol stori blg tanim i stap - ating dispela folda i stap long "SD card.
stories_not_found_in_progress: Ating nogat sampela ol stori i gohet.
stories_not_found_completed: Ating nogat sampela ol stori i pinis.
welcome_screen_select_template_folder:
Story Producer o dispela Tul blg Tanim ol Stori i narakain liklik. Pastaim yu mas redim ol liklik samting na bihain yu ken lukim na yusim tul ya. Pastaim yu mas kamapim nupela folda long SD kad (o long ples we i gat planti spes long pon) na yu mas kisim (daunlodim) ol stori sel blg tanim na putim ol stori sel long dispela folda. ) where the story template files must be downloaded by you.
(If your SD card has already been prepared, skip down to "Select 'SP Templates' Folder")

To prepare your SD card...
Go HERE for detailed instructions
OR follow these summary instructions:
1. Use Google Drive and download story templates from HERE
2. Use a Files app to create a folder on the SD card, and name it SP Templates
3. With the Files app, Move or Copy story template(s) to the SP Templates folder

After you have prepared the SP Templates folder, proceed:
workspace_selection_help:
Tell the Story Producer app where to find story templates.

The next screen will be a 'folder picker'.
Navigate to the SP Templates folder (on the SD Card), then tap SELECT at the bottom.
